comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qv5awtI9tzw&t=10s](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DQv5awtI9tzw%26t%3D10s) ### Comment > Adguard appears to work once, if I am lucky. After that once, it does not appear to work at all. Every subsequent window or tab I open in Youtube has ads. Often the video will not run, it is stopped on the first part of an ad.
